billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Provides for the same real property tax exemption for veterans to persons in active duty and deployed to the Persian Gulf, and/or wars in Afghanistan and Iraq
summary: Provides for the same real property tax exemption for veterans to persons in active duty and deployed to the Persian Gulf, and/or wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to adding active military personnel who have been deployed to the Persian Gulf, Afghanistan or Iraq wars to the veteran real property exemption
